current: Graphic Designer at Essex Property Trust

current.title: Graphic Designer
current.desc:
- Responsible for design needs for over 240 apartment homes for one of the leading West Coast real estate investment trust.
- Logo designs/redesigns for renovated and newly-acquired apartment homes; used for new monument signs, all related marketing needs including but not limited to branding, communications, signage, printed materials, website.
- Marketing card and direct mailer designs for reaching out to prospects.
- Banner and pole banner designs to promote apartment home appeal and amenities.
- Flyer designs for communications with both residents and prospect.
- Email designs for drawing new customers and reaching out to existing residents.
